title: How to Make Tomato and Onion Chutney

steps.headline: Cut the tomatoes, onions, and green chillies into small pieces.
Heat the oil in the pan.
steps.description: Fry the mustard and cumin seeds for a minute.

steps.headline: Add the hing, curry leaves, green chili and onions.
Add the garlic paste continue frying.
Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until the tomatoes get gravy.
Add the red chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, sugar, salt and...
Fry until the oil in the pan separates.

text: Cut the tomatoes, onions, and green chillies into small pieces.  Heat the oil in the pan. Fry the mustard and cumin seeds for a minute. Add the hing, curry leaves, green chili and onions. Deep fry until... ... The onions turn brownish. Add the garlic paste continue frying.  Add the chopped tomatoes and cook until the tomatoes get gravy.  Add the red chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, sugar, salt and...  ... The groundnut powder. Fry until the oil in the pan separates.  Garnish with fresh coriander (cilantro) leaves.  Serve with parathas or rice.  Enjoy the delicious chutney!
